EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Invite 2 plus call for papers - English
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now! Tricentis Accelerate – 22. October 2015 - Vienna
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
Accelerate - October 22nd, 2015 Novomatic Forum, Vienna 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. Followed by buffet & reception
Register now, free of charge!
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Registration for Tricentis Accelerate 2015 <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> is now open! Join us for an inspiring day full of seminars, workshops and networking in Vienna, Austria.
This year, our conference will be highlighting the following topics:
- Test Automation - Service Virtualization - Mobile Testing - Agile & DevOps
Interested in presenting at Accelerate 2015? Send your proposal using the Call for Paper form <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/tricentis/images/C4P_Accelerate.pdf> to: accelerate@tricentis.com <mailto:accelerate@tricentis.com>.
We have extended our Call for Papers deadline for you to July 10th, 2015!
We look forward to receiving your ideas and meeting you soon in Vienna.
Best regards,
The Tricentis Accelerate Team
